text: Marcus Wheeler is a Singaporean footballer who plays as a defender for S.League club Young Lions. == Career == He started his career with Tanjong Pagar United before moving to the Warriors when the team pulled out of the Sleague in 2015. http://sleague.com/news-features/news/2014/december/warriors- face-yadanarbon-upon-return-to-champions-league He then moved on to the Young Lions after his contract with the Warriors is not renewed for the 2016 season. http://www.sleague.com/news-features/news/2016/february/s-league-2016-team- preview-garena-young-lions ==Career statistics== .
